headline.main: BRITISH PROTEST TO SPAIN; Consul Takes Up Arrest of Jews and Arabs in Tangier

lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 1 (U.P.) -- A lengthy oral protest by the British Consul General at Tangier against Spanish authorities' arrest of 300 Jews and Arabs of pro-Allied sympathies was regarded today as showing a sharp stiffening in British policy.
abstract: Brit protest Spanish adm arrest of pro-Allied sympathizers, Tangier
snippet: LONDON, June 1 (U.P.) -- A lengthy oral protest by the British Consul General at Tangier against Spanish authorities' arrest of 300 Jews and Arabs of pro-Allied sympathies was regarded today as showing a sharp stiffening in British policy....
